content: don t quite suit your needs you can also adjust the fit of your socks by choosing to use needles a quart or half size smaller or larger * ** gauge** 36 stitches x 38 row = 10cm in colourwork 38 stitches x 44 row = 10cm in stockinette stitch and rib ** yarn** the percy socks are knitted with the 3 colors of the percy kit from bulbe bizarre in merino fingering sock wool + nylon 400m for 100g main color 38 40 48g in the percy color orange contrasting color 1 16 18 20g for the selenite color brown contrasting color 2 7 10 15g for the petit vagabond color ecru
